LongDescription:
Take Charge! 
 MalipoTV is a tweak that enables the charge sound when you plug in your remote to charge. 
 Based on the popular iOS tweak by yours truly! You can also choose from a list of custom sounds or drop in your own! 
 Follow me on Twitter (@iKilledAppl3), 
 Donate via PayPal (https://paypal.me/iKilledAppl3). 
 Support me on Patreon! (https://www.patreon.com/iKilledAppl3) 
 Changelog: 
 Version 1.0-1 - Release. 
 Version 1.0.1-1 - Fixes a bug that would conflict with the preferences for JitterBugTV.
